item.title: Lauren add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
Lauren add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "I was dead until you found me, though I breathed. I was sightless, though I could see. And then you came...and I was awakened." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "In your past lies your future. [Acheron Parthenopaeus]" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Karen Marie Moning
item.description: "If aught must be lost, ‘twill be my honor for yours. If one must be forsaken, ‘twill be my soul for yours. Should death come anon, ‘twill be my life for yours. I am Given." -- Karen Marie Moning

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Sometimes things have to go wrong in order to go right." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Lauren add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "Terrific. A bisexual dominant vampire with kidnapping expertise." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "The Simi is environmentally sound. Eat everything except for hooves" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Questions are great, but only if you know the answers. If you ask questions and the answers surprise you, you look silly." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Vampires are people too!" -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Methinks we have a clue. Be still, my heart." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Lauren add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "I don't have pet peeves - I have major psychotic fucking hatreds." -- George Carlin

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "I don't suffer from my insanity -- I enjoy every minute of it." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "I talk to myself everyone once in a while. Give myself very good advice. Sometimes I even take it." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Let me BBQ the red headed bitch goddess - Simi" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "I'd never met coffee that wasn't wonderful. It was just a matter of how wonderful it was." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "A girl could never have too much jewelry or too much weaponry." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Life isn't finding shelter in the storm. It's about learning to dance in the rain." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Lauren add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "You speak an infinite deal of nothing." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "People are supposed to fear the unknown, but ignorance is bliss when knowledge is so damn frightening." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Karen Marie Moning
item.description:
"The kiss....was not meant to seduce, it was meant to mark a woman's soul.
Chloe" -- Karen Marie Moning

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "What did they think I was going to do, steal a body? If I wanted to, I could empty the damn place and get every corpse to play follow the leader. Perhaps that was why I needed watching. Perhaps." --Anita Blake" -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "One thing I've learned about vampires--they keep pulling new rabbits out of their cloaks. Big, fanged, carnivorous bunnies that'll eat your eyeballs if you're not paying attention." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "And I flunked anger management the moment I put the counselor through a stone wall. You might want to keep that in mind. [Thorn]" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "He who hesitates is a damned fool." -- Mae West

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Lauren add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "May the forces of evil become confused on the way to your house." -- George Carlin

item.title: Lauren add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "People who see life as anything more than pure entertainment are missing the point." -- George Carlin
